It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifndef PB_DS_COND_DEALTOR_HPP 42 #define PB_DS_COND_DEALTOR_HPP 43 44 #include <ext/pb_ds/detail/types_traits.hpp> 45 46 namespace __gnu_pbds 47 { 48 namespace detail 49 { 51 template<typename Entry, typename _Alloc> 52 class cond_dealtor 53 { 54 typedef rebind_traits<_Alloc, Entry> alloc_traits; 55 56 public: 57 typedef typename alloc_traits::allocator_type entry_allocator; 58 typedef typename alloc_traits::pointer entry_pointer; 59 60 cond_dealtor(entry_pointer p_e) 61 : m_p_e(p_e), m_no_action_destructor(false) { } 62 63 ~cond_dealtor() 64 { 65 if (m_no_action_destructor) 66 return; 67 s_alloc.deallocate(m_p_e, 1); 68 } 69 70 void 71 set_no_action() 72 { m_no_action_destructor = true; } 73 74 private: 75 entry_pointer m_p_e; 76 bool m_no_action_destructor; 77 static entry_allocator s_alloc; 78 }; 79 80 template<typename Entry, class _Alloc> 81 typename cond_dealtor<Entry, _Alloc>::entry_allocator 82 cond_dealtor<Entry, _Alloc>::s_alloc; 83 } // namespace detail 84 } // namespace __gnu_pbds 85 86 #endif // #ifndef PB_DS_COND_DEALTOR_HPP
